title: Dune: Part Two
description: In the continuation of Paul Atreides' epic journey, 'Dune: Part Two' follows the young hero as he unites with the Fremen to seek revenge against those who destroyed his family. As Paul embraces his destiny and rises as the prophesied messiah, he must choose between the love of his life and the fate of the known universe. Amid war, betrayal, and political intrigue on the desert planet of Arrakis, Paul’s actions could lead to salvation — or the destruction of all.
